metadata.title: CVE-2022-24836 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Nokogiri is an open source XML and HTML library for Ruby. Nokogiri `<v1.13.4` contains an inefficient regular expression that is susceptible toexcessive backtracking when attempting to detect encoding in HTMLdocuments. Users are advised to upgrade to Nokogiri `>= 1.13.4`. There areno known workarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: ruby-nokogiri package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
